website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight all-in-one suit is perfect for warm weather races.
pros: Chafe-free support and design is great for the biking portion of the race
Back pocket can hold small items
No built-in bra, so women can wear their own
Soft leg finish keeps suit in place and won't ride up
cons: This is not designed for cold water swimming

customer_reviews.title: Triathlon gear made easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first TriSuit and I bought it based on a recommendation from my training partner that loved SLS3 gear. I'm glad I listened to her and bought this. Great price! Great quality and fit! I'm 5'4" and a fit 145 pounds and the medium fits great. The material stretches nicely and the padding has holes for water to drain. It's still winter where I live, but I'm excited to try this out this spring & summer. Having one item to wear the whole triathlon will make my transitions easier.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Order smaller than you need
customer_reviews.text: Even after reviewing the size chart I ordered a large as recommended. I am 5-6 165 lbs. The large is baggy on you. I neglected to read the return policy which states you cannot return it if you remove the tags. unfortunately I can't wear this and it's unused but I did remove the tags. And other waste of money. I do have a full size chest as well. I would consider purchasing a smaller size if you are looking into this product.
customer_reviews.author: AUAlum1998

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and fit true to size! I am only 5’3”, but wear a size 10. The large fit perfectly & wasn’t too long in the torso. You’ll want to wear a running bra underneath, but that is true with pretty much all tri suits. Used it for a triathlon with an ocean swim, no issues with chaffing. It was great!
customer_reviews.author: museumgirl

customer_reviews.title: Quality tri suit with an few unfortunate flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Quality tri suit with an few unfortunate flaws Great for tall athletic builds but large gap in the torso (does not fit flush to the skin) and significant chafing under the arms after a 70.3 race which has never happened before with other bands/ distance. Otherwise suit is attractive (color and leg design is fun), well made and leg closures stay firmly in place.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S.

customer_reviews.title: Great triathlon suit.
customer_reviews.text: Great triathlon suit! Loved this suit! Ordered a couple of days before my very 1st triathlon received the day before, tried it on and was worried that it would be a bit snug on the shoulders but when it came to the day of the event it felt so comfortable. I’m 5.3 and 127lb ordered small and it fits perfectly. Looks great, feels great. I’m looking forward to order the pink one. Highly recommended! BTW you do need to buy a bra.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: I'm not tall enough to find this suit too short for my body
customer_reviews.text: 5'8", 135 pounds (171 CM, 61KG). This suit is just not quite long enough for my height. I purchased a medium. Great fit on the body, but a stretch for my height. A size up would have been too big. The butt padding works well for cycling. There is zero chest support, so you have to wear a high support sports bra. The legs of the shorts do not move because there is a nice sticky strip to keep them in place, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits as the chart indicates. I’m 5,3 108-112 lbs athletic build. I’m leaving this review because the reviews didn’t match my size. Some go up A size however if you fit the chart as it says the suit fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, doesn't chaff, and has pockets. STILL, it bells out in my back, going straight from my shoulder blades to my butt. I look like a Weeble Wobble from the side. Or maybe I look like a big Sponge Bob? Either way, it's not attractive, and I look bad enough when I'm racing.
customer_reviews.author: bateacher

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable. Dried wicked fast
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Dried wicked fast. No chafing or discomfort at all. Literally never even thought about my suit during the triathlon which is great! I weigh 160 lb and the medium fit me great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nutt

customer_reviews.title: The fit is perfect..
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect...the pocket is of good size and holds my stuff securely...went with my height, and measurements over my weight since My size is smaller than my scale number and I was fitting in both the small and med areas on the chart...went with the small and happy I did...
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany N Ring

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" and weigh 130 lbs. This Tri suit is a perfect fit. I have worn it for biking, running, and under my wetsuit for swimming. I use the pocket in the back for my phone and gels when biking or running. I really like the fit and quality, and will buy more items from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter tri kit
customer_reviews.text: Very flattering and no chafing or riding. No need to size up. The brand lettering has started to peel off after 2 washes though.
customer_reviews.author: KLE

customer_reviews.title: low cut
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try this suit, I noticed it felt a little larger than I expected when trying it on, but I thought what the heck lets check it out. My First swim the drag I felt due to the low cut front was horrible. I am not overly large chested, had a sports bra on and still the drag... be cautious if you plan to wear this without a wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Tall and Small
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’9” and 126lbs. I bought a small after much thought between product size chart info/recommendations to go up a size and customer reviews to go down a size. My height is on the medium side and my weight is on the small side. I ultimately went with the customer reviews that suggest stay on the smaller side due to stretching when wet. The small fits perfectly out of the box. I haven’t swam in it yet. It is super cute. So far I would recommend it but we’ll see how it holds up!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A Little Stretchy
customer_reviews.text: Got me through my first triathlon. I liked the way it looked when dry. When wet, it stretched out quite a bit. I wore a wet suit for the race so the stretching didn’t matter much. I had tried on a few others and I felt my “voluptuous” physique looked best in this one. :-)
customer_reviews.author: git

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and flattering runs small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Fits front to back but is a tad too short (shoulder time hip wise.
customer_reviews.author: PennB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trisuit
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much I bought another. Thin shammy, great to swim in. It’s very comfortable, and thinning.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Bird

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This suit fit perfectly and was perfect for my triathlon!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Too loose in the back waist area
customer_reviews.text: Would have loved this Tri Suit but it fit loose in the back waist area. I’m not sure if the top part was too short for my frame which caused it to buckle out back there or not but ultimately I had to return it. I wish that part fit better and more snug to my body. It was a cute suit.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this tri suit for my first Sprint Triathlon. It was amazing! Quick dry, no chafing and so comfortable! It fit me perfect too! Very happy and will wear it for my next event!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. No seams, zippers or areas where the material rubs no matter if I'm running or biking. I like the leggings and padded seat. Can't wait for the triathlon now!
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Quality, comfort & value
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly on me. I warned it in a practice session, swimming, biking, and running. I like the design and quality of the suit. I am positive that the suit will help my performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice suit. Went a size larger but shouldn’t have. Plenty long.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: It fits nicely, but there is absolutely no support for anyone with breasts. OK for swimming but, without an additional sports bra, running and biking are out.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Tri suit
customer_reviews.text: I was racing my first triathlon so I ordered the suit and shorts from the same brand. I took XL in both. The shorts fit well but the suit was big, so sadly I had to return the suit and probably order L in the future. But definitely was good quality Tri Suit!
customer_reviews.author: ANG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tri-Suit!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn this at three short distance triathlons and it is so comfortable and made well. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome tri race suit
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tri race suit!!! Super comfortable and held up great in my race! I will most definitely buy another one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great suit. Looks and performs as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Hank's father

customer_reviews.title: My first triathlon suit
customer_reviews.text: I read the previous reviews related to fit to try to get the correct size. Those comments were very helpful and I was pleased that mine fit perfectly. I'm 5'4" and weigh 127 so I purchased a small. The suit was comfortable for the swim and dried quickly for the bike and run portions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable, Snug and Secure
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that the zipper would slowly start to undo but I have now worn and washed this suite four times. I like the colorful patterns on the knee and how the thinner strap fits on the shoulder. I have felt other tri suites and this feels a little thicker, but that's what I wanted. I am 5/2 and size small, so i got the small. Fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Keane

product_meta.title: SLS3 Women's Triathlon Suit - Womens Triathlon Suits - Tri Suits for Women - Trisuit - 1 Pocket - Anti-Friction Seams - Slim Athletic Fit FX (No Shelf Bra)
feature_bullets: ✅ To properly fit into our suits, both your height and weight measurements must match the specific size range (i.e. weight size M and height size M). If both of your height and weight measurements DO NOT match the specific size range, we suggest you consider the option of a top and shorts set. This option will provide you a more comfortable and flattering fit. THESE TRI SUITS ARE DESIGNED WITH A SLIM ATHLETIC ELONGATED SILHOUETTE AND OFFER A SLIM ATHLETIC FIT.

PERFECT PADDING FOR CYCLING & RUNNING: Our custom foam-cushioned pad on this tri suit for women provides chafe-free support throughout your entire bike ride. Plus, it's so light & slim you won`t even notice it is there and it won`t give you the feeling like running in a wet diaper. Thanks to our back pocket (3.5"x4.5"), your nourishment is always handy. Reach easily to grab your energy gels, bars & chews.

DESIGNED TO KEEP YOU COMFY + CUTE: You will LOVE the color, style and coverage of this flattering women`s triathlon swimsuit. Our flexible fabric blend stretches in ALL directions for a sleek and supportive fit and it comes without itchy seams. The legs are long enough to prevent chaffing on the run plus the soft gripper keeps the legs in place without the feeling of having “sausage legs”. We are NOT using a built in bra so you can wear the bra of your choice – BYOB (Bring your own Bra).

ULTIMATE COOL: Made of a super-comfortable nylon/spandex mix, your SLS3 Women Triathlon Suit wicks sweat, then evaporates it FAST, to keep you cool & dry. We added mesh panels on the side and back to keep you even more comfortable.

FRONT ZIP FOR CUSTOMIZED COMFORT: Race heating up? Breathe easy. Just open the front half-zipper (11" long for size M) to let in cooling airflow. Chill in the air? Pull the zip back up & lock it down in its zipper garage. The zipper is also long enough (10.5") to easily get into and out of the trisuit. THE SUIT IS NOT RECOMMENDED FOR REPEATED USE IN CHLORINATED WATER!
